com.hcl.domino.dbdirectory

Interface DbDirectory


  • public interface DbDirectory
    Very fast directory scanner

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<DirEntry> listFiles(String server)
      Returns the content of the server directory at the top-level.
      List<DirEntry> listFiles(String server, String directory)
      Returns the content of a single directory on a Domino server
      List<DirEntry> listFiles(String server, String directory, String formula)
      Returns the content of a server directory, filtered via formula
      DirectorySearchQuery query()
      With this method you can create a more advanced query for files on any Domino server

    • Method Detail

      • listFiles

        List<DirEntry> listFiles(String server)
        Returns the content of the server directory at the top-level.
        Parameters:
        server - server name, either abbreviated, canonical or common name
        Returns:
        found file entries (either FolderData or DatabaseData instances)

      • listFiles

        List<DirEntry> listFiles(String server,
                         String directory)
        Returns the content of a single directory on a Domino server
        Parameters:
        server - server name, either abbreviated, canonical or common name
        directory - directory name or empty string for top-level directory
        Returns:
        found file entries (either FolderData or DatabaseData instances)

      • listFiles

        List<DirEntry> listFiles(String server,
                         String directory,
                         String formula)
        Returns the content of a server directory, filtered via formula
        Parameters:
        server - server to scan
        directory - directory name or empty string for top level directory
        formula - optional search formula to filter the returned entries, see DirEntry.getProperties() for available fields, e.g. $path="mydb.nsf" or @Word($info;@char(10);2)="db category name"
        Returns:
        search result

      • query

        DirectorySearchQuery query()
        With this method you can create a more advanced query for files on any Domino server
        Returns:
        query object to refine and perform the search
